page.title: 05PERRAN-AR-WORTHAL C P SCHOOL
page.content: Perran-ar-Worthal C.P. School was built in 1878 and most of the original buildings, except the old toilet block are still in use. The toilet block was was replaced in 1980, when new child- rens toilets, staff toilets and an office were added.We also have a temp- orary classroom in the playground and another one is about to arrive.We have 125 children and four classes (two ju- nior and two infants). As well as the headteacher, there are 3 other full- teachers and a part-time teacher who teaches half-time. We have 2 lunchtime supervisors, a helper for the Rising Fives, a school secretary and a care- taker. We have a large country play- ground surrounded by trees but no hall. Meals are cooked on the premises and eaten in the classrooms.We use the Village Hall for PE once a week and the village Playing Field for games.
